snippet: Cliven Bundy lost a renewed bid Thursday for release from jail ahead of trial on federal conspiracy and assault charges stemming from an armed standoff against government agents two years ago.
abstract: Federal Magistrate Judge Carl Hoffman denies Cliven Bundy's bid to be released from jail in advance of trial for federal conspiracy and assault charges following armed standoff against government agents in Nevada.
lead_paragraph: Cliven Bundy lost a renewed bid Thursday for release from jail ahead of trial on federal conspiracy and assault charges stemming from an armed standoff against government agents two years ago.

headline.main: Nevada: Release Denied for Bundy in 2014 Standoff
headline.print_headline: Nevada: Release Denied for Bundy in 2014 Standoff
